title: Skin Disease Detection AI
description: AI-powered project for detecting skin diseases using image analysis and machine learning. It assists dermatologists in faster, more reliable diagnoses by recognizing patterns in medical images.

title: Weapon and Vehicle Crash Detection
description: Surveillance system using AI to detect weapons and vehicle crashes in real-time. Sends immediate alerts to users or authorities, enhancing safety and response time.

title: Cartoon Return
description: An OTT platform for children's content, developed using Java. It allows users to browse, stream, and manage cartoons and animations with a user-friendly interface.

title: Database Query Automator
description: MySQL-based project that simplifies complex database querying for non-technical users with an easy-to-use interface.
